=== About Me ===

<nowiki>[[http://amithkk.com|Website]]</nowiki>

I'm a 14 year old Ubuntu User, Contributor and a FOSS Supporter living in Bangalore, india. a member of  <nowiki>[[http://askubuntu.com/users/17722/amith-kk|AskUbuntu]]</nowiki>. Spreading ubuntu and  also giving technical support to my friends and neighbours since 2009.I am currently studying in 9th standard. I'm also an editor on the 2buntu Blog and a member of freyja-dev.
